scripts.docker: npm run docker-accounts && npm run docker-products
scripts.installs: npm install && npm run install-adminapp &&  npm run install-vendorapp &&  npm run install-shopperapp && npm run install-accounts && npm run install-products
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "npm run accounts" "npm run products" "npm run shopperapp" "npm run adminapp" "npm run vendorapp"
scripts.cis: npm ci && npm run ci-accounts && npm run ci-products && npm run ci-shopperapp && npm run ci-vendorapp && npm run ci-adminapp
scripts.build: npm run build-accounts && npm run build-products && npm run build-shopperapp && npm run build-vendorapp && npm run build-adminapp
scripts.lints: npm run lint-accounts && npm run lint-products && npm run lint-shopperapp && npm run lint-vendorapp && npm run lint-adminapp
